summary: This mod adding Vexar - The Khajiit combat assassin follower.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=3]Follower Specifications:
Race: Khajiit
Class: Combat Assassin
Location: "Sleeping Giant Inn" in Riverwood
Weapons: Created by me (in Creation Kit) special versions of Daedric Dagger and Ebony Bow. The "Throatslasher" and the "Heartpiercer"
Armor: Default armor set from Riften's Thieves Guild.

[u][color=#ffff00]Vexar have also a plenty of perks, that helps him with Archery, One Handed weapons and sneaking. Thanks to perk "Light Foot" - he can't activate the traps, so exploring the dungeons with him is a lot easier.[/color][/u][/size][u][color=#ff0000]
[/color][/u]

[size=3]Special Requirements: None

Install & Uninstall Notes: In archive

This is first mod created by me in my life. Im hoping for a constructive criticism. Have a nice day :)[/size]

[/b][b][u][size=4][color=#ffff00]NOTICE: REMEMBER TO TAKE A HUNTING BOW FROM VEXAR'S EQ. WHEN YOU REMOVE IT, VEXAR WILL USE HIS SPECIAL "HEARTPIERCER" BOW. THIS IS A WELL-KNOWN PC BUG AND I CAN'T REMOVE IT FROM HIS EQ USING A CREATION KIT.[/color]


[/size][/u][/b]
author: Saxuric
